properties.name: container-type
properties.description: Defines an element as a query container. Descendants can query aspects of its sizing, layout, style and state.

properties.name: container-name
properties.description: Specifies a list of query container names for @container rules to use to filter which query containers are targeted.

properties.name: container
properties.description: A shorthand property to set both container-type and container-name.
